user_query: I am planning a road trip across the United States and I need to find the nearest alternative fuel stations along my route. Can you provide me with a list of stations within a 50-mile radius from Los Angeles? Also, please include the station names, addresses, and available fuel types.

TaskList.description: Query for alternative fuel stations within a 50-mile radius from Los Angeles.
Retrieve details of each found station including names, addresses, and available fuel types.
